short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl + Left/Right/Up/Down) to move currently selected tab to adjacent windows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creates keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl + Left/Right/Up/Down) to move currently selected tab to adjacent windows
Adds keyboard shortcuts (by default Ctrl + Left/Right/Up/Down) for moving tabs between adjacent windows. Especially useful when you are using a tiled window manager or have multiple monitors.

Source code is available at: https://github.com/Mellbourn/ShiftTab
